review: Well, I think I am going to enjoy this. I am not much for network TV but love the idea of streaming movies and the Sopranos. I am sure I will find much more as time goes on.

review: Easy to use and good quality. There is plenty to look at so you can probably delete some programs you pay for from cable. It is a pretty intuitive software package that runs the programming. The price is so reasonable that I bought two of them; one for upstairs and one for downstairs. I would recommend them to anyone.

review: Although I love the Fire Stick, I think it might have been better to get the Fire TV.  We have found when we are watching movies, it stops working as it tries to load.  It works fine for series and shows, but not for movies.  I love Amazon Prime, and I am disappointed it doesn't transfer as well to the the tv.
